Package com.appglu.android.task

Interface Summary
ImageViewAsyncCallback.ImageDownloadListener Provide callbacks methods when the image is being downloaded in background.
 

Class Summary
AppGluAsyncCallbackTask<Result> Adapt AppGluAsyncTask callbacks to a more user friendly version implemented in the AsyncCallback abstract class.
AsyncCallback is used in every asynchronous method of the SDK.
AppGluAsyncTask<Params,Progress,Result> Extension of Android's AsyncTask to add AppGluAsyncTask.onException(Exception) and AppGluAsyncTask.onFinished(boolean) callbacks.
AppGluAsyncTaskCompat<Result> Extension of Android's Ice Cream Sandwich port of AsyncTask to add AppGluAsyncTaskCompat.onException(Exception) and AppGluAsyncTaskCompat.onFinished(boolean) callbacks.
AsyncTaskCompat<Params,Progress,Result> This class was copied from Ice Cream Sandwich to make it possible to execute tasks with a serial thread pool executor on Android versions before HONEYCOMB.
AsyncTaskExecutor A AsyncExecutor implementation that uses AppGluAsyncTask to provide asynchronous execution.
AsyncTaskExecutor.AbstractSerialExecutor Base class for Executors.
AsyncTaskExecutor.CompatQueueExecutor User by Android versions bellow HONEYCOMB.
AsyncTaskExecutor.CompatStackExecutor User by Android versions bellow HONEYCOMB.
AsyncTaskExecutor.NativeAsyncTaskExecutor This class will help to hide the executeOnExecutor method from being picked by the VM on older versions of Android.
Older versions do not support executeOnExecutor.
AsyncTaskExecutor.NativeQueueExecutor Only available for Android HONEYCOMB and up.
AsyncTaskExecutor.NativeStackExecutor Only available for Android HONEYCOMB and up.
ImageViewAsyncCallback AsyncCallback implementation to load image Bitmaps into a ImageView, displaying a progress View while the image is being loaded and a place holder View if the image fails loading.
ImageViewAsyncCallback.DefaultImageDownloadListener  
 

Enum Summary
AsyncTaskCompat.Status
